abstract: NBC will move much of its sports operation to Stamford, Conn., under a deal reached with the state that includes tax incentives and a $20 million loan.
snippet: NBC will move much of its sports operation to Stamford, Conn., under a deal reached with the state that includes tax incentives and a $20 million loan.
lead_paragraph: NBC and the governor of Connecticut, Dannel P. Malloy, made it official on Tuesday -- much of NBC's sports operation will move to Stamford.

headline.main: Tax Deal Lures NBC Sports to Connecticut
